Row.Text: A Great Person with one charge. Can only be trained in the Capital, and the specific Doge received is random. Each Doge can only be received once. Cost increases per Doge trained.
Create a Bazaar in a City. This Bazaar receives +2[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. Tile must have less than 2 Buildings and the City cannot have a Bazaar.
Create a Dungeon in a City. This Dungeon receives +2[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. Tile must have less than 2 Buildings and the City cannot have a Dungeon.
Create a Guildhall in a City. This Guildhall receives +2[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. Tile must have less than 2 Buildings and the City cannot have a Guildhall.
Create a Kiln in a City. This Kiln receives +2[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. Tile must have less than 2 Buildings and the City cannot have a Kiln.
Create a Observatory in a City. This Observatory receives +2[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. Tile must have less than 2 Buildings and the City cannot have a Observatory.
Create a Tavern in a City. This Tavern receives +2[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. Tile must have less than 2 Buildings and the City cannot have a Tavern.
Create a Wharf in a City. This Wharf receives +2[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. Tile must have less than 2 Buildings and the City cannot have a Wharf.
Activate on an Fleet Commander to grant it 2 free Promotions.
Activated on a Fleet Commander Unit to change its name to "Despot of the Latins." Gains 1 charge to create a new Settlement for every 3 Levels it has.
Creates a Fleet Commander in this City.
